required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Candidate Gene Association Study With Injury in Elite Male Youth Football Players
clinical_study.official_title: Candidate Gene Association Study With Injury, Non-Contact Injury, Non-Contact Muscle Injury, Fracture and Apophysitis Injury in Elite Male Youth Football Players

brief_summary.textblock: Understanding how candidate genes, previously associated with injury susceptibility, influence the incidence of muscle, bone, ligament, and tendon injuries across the development pathway of elite footballers may provide valuable insight into inherent injury predisposition to support the long-term development of every individual. Therefore, the aim of the present study was to investigate the association between candidate genetic variants and muscle, bone, ligament, and tendon injuries in elite football with sub-analysis of the influence of age and maturation on injury susceptibility.

detailed_description.textblock: Genetic variants in several candidate genes which code for structural constituents (COL1A1 rs1800012, COL1A2 rs412777, COL5A1 rs12722 and ACTN3 rs1815739), regulatory components (ACE rs1799752, ESR1 rs2234693 and MMP3 rs679620) and transcription factors (VDR rs2228570 and GDF5 rs143383) affecting the form, function and injury susceptibility of muscle, bone, ligament, and tendon tissue will be associated with overall injury, non-contact, bone, ligament, tendon and apophysitis injury risk in elite male youth and adult footballers.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of non-injured and injured participants with injury risk alleles
primary_outcome.description: Injury, Non-Contact Injury, Non-Contact Muscle Injury, Fracture and Apophysitis Injury

intervention.description: COL1A1 rs1800012, COL1A2 rs412777, COL5A1 rs12722, ACTN3 rs1815739, ACE rs1799752, ESR1 rs2234693, MMP3 rs679620, VDR rs2228570 and GDF5 rs143383

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Elite Male Footballer Player Registered at Fulham Football Club
Exclusion Criteria:
- Female no longer registered at Fulham Football Club
